title: MicroNeuSeg: a Python-based software to segment and analyze microglial association with neurons in mouse microscopy images.
description: This upload contains a Python-based software to segment three channels of images: Microglia, PV, NeuN and analyze microglial association with neurons in mouse microscopy images.
